workflow.name: Brand DNA generator using JotForm, Google Search, Gemini AI & Notion
workflow.description:
# Automated Brand DNA Generator Using JotForm, Google Search, AI Extraction & Notion

The Brand DNA Generator workflow automatically scans and analyzes online content to build a company‚Äôs Brand DNA profile.  It starts with input from a form, then crawls the company‚Äôs website and Google search results to gather relevant information. Using AI-powered extraction, the system identifies insights such as value propositions, ideal customer profiles (ICP), pain points, proof points, brand tone, and more.  All results are neatly formatted and automatically saved to a Notion database as a structured Brand DNA report, eliminating the need for manual research.

## üõ†Ô∏è Key Features
- Automated data capture, collects company data directly from form submissions and Google search results.  
- Uses AI-powered insight extraction with LLMs to extract and summarize brand-related information from website content.  
- Fetches clean text from multiple web pages using HTTP requests and a content extractor.  
- Merges extracted data from multiple sources into a single Brand DNA JSON structure.  
- Automatically creates a new page in Notion with formatted sections (headings, paragraphs, and bullet points).  
- Handles parsing failures and processes multiple pages efficiently in batches.

## üîß Requirements
- JotForm API Key, to capture company data from form submissions.  
- SerpAPI Key, to perform automated Google searches.  
- OpenRouter / LLM API, for AI-based language understanding and information extraction.  
- Notion Integration Token & Database ID, to save the final Brand DNA report to Notion.

## üß© Setup Instructions
1. Connect your JotForm account and select the form containing the fields Company Name and Company Website.  
2. Add your SerpAPI Key.  
3. Configure the AI model using OpenRouter or LLM.  
4. Enter your Notion credentials and specify the databaseId in the Create a Database Page node.  
5. Customize the prompt in the Information Extractor node to modify the tone or structure of AI analysis (Optional).  
6. Activate the workflow, then submit data through the JotForm to test automatic generation and Notion integration.

## üí° Final Output  
A complete Brand DNA Report containing:
- Company Description  
- Ideal Customer Profile  
- Pain Points  
- Value Proposition  
- Proof Points  
- Brand Tone  
- Suggested Keywords  
All generated automatically from the company‚Äôs online presence and stored in Notion with no manual input required.

workflow.name: Automated Brand DNA Generator Using JotForm, Google Search, AI Extraction & Notion

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are an expert information extraction algorithm.
Your task is to extract only essential and relevant information about the company named "{{ $('JotForm Trigger').item.json['Company Name'] }}" and its context within the article text.
If a field or value is not available, omit it completely. Do not fabricate or infer information.
Return only a clean and valid JSON object following the provided schema.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "companyName":"11x.ai",
  "relatedToBrand": "reply.io",
  "isRelated": true,
  "relationType": "positioning",
  "reason": "The article mentions 11x as an AI sales automation platform and includes a demo link.",
  "articleGoal": "To compare UberConference alternatives and highlight 11x's position within the sales tools ecosystem.",
  "excerpt": "Transform your revenue team with digital AI workers that execute, learn, and optimize.",
  "summary": "The article introduces 11x as an AI-driven solution for automating sales and prospect management.",
  "keyPoints": [
    "11x positions itself as an AI sales automation platform.",
    "The article compares various meeting and communication tools.",
    "Includes a demo link to showcase 11x‚Äôs capabilities.",
    "Focuses on digital AI workers improving sales efficiency."
  ]
}

options.systemPromptTemplate:
=You are a brand strategist.
Merge multiple extraction results into one concise Brand DNA for the company named "{{ $json.relatedToBrand }}".
Return STRICT JSON only, no extra text. Be factual; do not invent details.
Consolidate duplicates, remove overlap, and keep language neutral and concise.
If a field has no evidence, omit it entirely.

parameters.content:
# Automated Brand DNA Generator Using JotForm, Google Search, AI Extraction & Notion

The Brand DNA Generator workflow automatically scans and analyzes online content to build a company‚Äôs Brand DNA profile.  It starts with input from a form, then crawls the company‚Äôs website and Google search results to gather relevant information. Using AI-powered extraction, the system identifies insights such as value propositions, ideal customer profiles (ICP), pain points, proof points, brand tone, and more.  All results are neatly formatted and automatically saved to a Notion database as a structured Brand DNA report, eliminating the need for manual research.

## üõ†Ô∏è Key Features
- Automated data capture, collects company data directly from form submissions and Google search results.  
- Uses AI-powered insight extraction with LLMs to extract and summarize brand-related information from website content.  
- Fetches clean text from multiple web pages using HTTP requests and a content extractor.  
- Merges extracted data from multiple sources into a single Brand DNA JSON structure.  
- Automatically creates a new page in Notion with formatted sections (headings, paragraphs, and bullet points).  
- Handles parsing failures and processes multiple pages efficiently in batches.

## üîß Requirements
- JotForm API Key, to capture company data from form submissions.  
- SerpAPI Key, to perform automated Google searches.  
- OpenRouter / LLM API, for AI-based language understanding and information extraction.  
- Notion Integration Token & Database ID, to save the final Brand DNA report to Notion.

## üß© Setup Instructions
1. Connect your JotForm account and select the form containing the fields Company Name and Company Website.  
2. Add your SerpAPI Key.  
3. Configure the AI model using OpenRouter or LLM.  
4. Enter your Notion credentials and specify the databaseId in the Create a Database Page node.  
5. Customize the prompt in the Information Extractor node to modify the tone or structure of AI analysis (Optional).  
6. Activate the workflow, then submit data through the JotForm to test automatic generation and Notion integration.

## üí° Final Output  
A complete Brand DNA Report containing:
- Company Description  
- Ideal Customer Profile  
- Pain Points  
- Value Proposition  
- Proof Points  
- Brand Tone  
- Suggested Keywords  
All generated automatically from the company‚Äôs online presence and stored in Notion with no manual input required.

- Starts the workflow when a new form submission is received from JotForm.
- Cleans and standardizes the submitted website URL.

- Automatically retrieves search results related to the company‚Äôs domain.
- Extracts and cleans URLs from the SerpAPI search results.

- Combine multiple extraction results (from many pages) into a single deduplicated record.
- Consolidate and synthesize extracted article-level data into a Brand DNA candidate.
- Provide the language model (LLM) backend used by the Information Extractor node.

- Format consolidated Brand DNA JSON into string fields suitable for Notion blocks.
- Persist the formatted Brand DNA into a Notion database as a new page.

- Fetches raw HTML content from a given website URL.
- Clean and extract readable text from raw HTML.

- Extracts structured and readable content from raw HTML.
- Uses AI to extract structured company-related information from the article.

user.name: Budi SJ
user.bio: I‚Äôm a Product Designer who also works as an Automation Developer. With a background in product design and systems thinking, I build user-centered workflows. My focus is on helping teams and businesses work more productively through impactful automation systems.
